import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../utils/AuthContext'; import { userAPI } from '../utils/userAPI'; import { toast } from 'react-hot-toast'; import { BookOpen, Users, BarChart3, Plus, Play, CheckCircle, Clock, Target, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; import { courseAPI } from '../utils/api'; export default function Dashboard() { const { user, hasRole } = useAuth(); const [stats, setStats] = useState({ totalCourses: 0, totalStudents: 0, totalLessons: 0, completedLessons: 0, pendingEnrollments: 0, averageCompletion: 0 }); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [enrollments, setEnrollments] = useState([]); const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { fetchDashboardStats(); fetchMyEnrollments(); }, []); const fetchDashboardStats = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const data = await userAPI.getDashboardStats(); setStats(data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching dashboard stats:', error); toast.error('Failed to fetch dashboard data'); // Fallback to mock data setStats({ totalCourses: 5, totalStudents: 24, totalLessons: 18, completedLessons: 12, pendingEnrollments: 8, averageCompletion: 85 }); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const fetchMyEnrollments = async () => { try { setLoading(true); const res = await courseAPI.getMyEnrollments(); setEnrollments(res.data.enrollments || []); } catch (err) { setEnrollments([]); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; const AdminDashboard = () => (

Total Courses

{stats.totalCourses}

Total Students

{stats.totalStudents}

Total Lessons

{stats.totalLessons}

Avg. Completion

{stats.averageCompletion}%

Quick Actions

Create New Course Manage Courses View Students

Recent Activity

New student enrolled

2 minutes ago

Course updated

1 hour ago

Assessment completed

3 hours ago

{/* Pending Enrollments Alert */} {stats.pendingEnrollments > 0 && (

Pending Enrollments

You have {stats.pendingEnrollments} enrollment requests waiting for approval

Review Now
)}
); const StudentDashboard = () => (

Enrolled Courses

3

Completed

{stats.completedLessons}

In Progress

6

Avg. Score

87%

Continue Learning

Continue Last Course Browse Courses

Recent Progress

Completed Meta Ads Lesson 3

2 hours ago

Started TikTok Ads Course

1 day ago

); if (loading) { return (
); } if (hasRole && hasRole('student')) { return (

Dashboard Siswa

{loading ? (
Loading...
) : enrollments.length === 0 ? (
Kamu belum mendaftar ke course manapun.
) : (
{enrollments.map((enr) => (
{enr.course?.thumbnail && ( )}

{enr.course?.title}

{enr.course?.category}
{enr.status === 'pending' && Pending} {enr.status === 'approved' && Approved} {enr.status === 'rejected' && Rejected}
Progress {enr.progress || 0}%
{enr.status === 'approved' && ( )}
))}
)}
); } return (
Dashboard hanya untuk siswa.
); }
